calibration.deck_calibration_description: Calibrate the position of the robot's deck. Recommended for all new robots and after moving robots.
calibration.deck_calibration_error_occured: An error occurred while trying to start deck calibration
calibration.deck_calibration_missing: You haven't calibrated the deck yet
calibration.definition: Your OT-2 moves pipettes around in 3D space based on its calibration. Learn more about how calibration works on the OT-2.
calibration.health_check_description: Check the health of the current calibration settings.
calibration.no_tip_length: Calibrate your pipette to see saved tip length
calibration.pipette_offset_description: Calibrate the position for the the default tip and pipette combination.
calibration.title: robot calibration
